settings.p1: The module configuration file is the module.json
items: name : Defines the name of the module, necessary so that the elements can be imported.
platforms : Defines the platforms supported by the module. The supported values are the identifiers of the existing platforms.

[bundle] : Refers to the identifier name of the type of bundle that you want to add to the module. A module can have one or more bundles. Each bundle receives a configuration object with the processors it uses and some inherent variation of the bundle type added.
